content.query:
CREATE TABLE OnlineTransactions (
    OrderID INT,
    CustomerID INT,
    ProductID INT,
    DateTime DATETIME,
    PaymentMethod VARCHAR(50),
    Amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    Status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE InStoreTransactions (
    TransactionID INT,
    CustomerID INT,
    StoreID INT,
    DateTime DATETIME,
    Amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PaymentMethod VARCHAR(50)
);
